tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_grievances (
  grievance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  grievance_date DATE,
  grievance_details TEXT,
  resolution_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE grievances (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    grievance_type VARCHAR(50),
    grievance_description TEXT,
    date_filed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    employee_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Grievances (
    grievance_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    grievance_description TEXT,
    date_filed DATE,
    resolved BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (grievance_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Resolutions (
    resolution_id INT,
    grievance_id INT,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    date_resolved DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (resolution_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (grievance_id) REFERENCES Grievances(grievance_id)
);
